{{Use dmy dates|date=July 2011}} {{Use British English|date=July 2011}} {{Infobox Album | | Name = X | Type = [[Album]] | Artist = [[Liberty X]] | Cover = X 2005.jpg | Released = 10 October 2005 ([[United Kingdom|UK]]) | Recorded = [[London]], [[England]] | Genre = [[Pop music|Pop]], [[R&B]], [[Dance music|Dance]] | Length = 53:14 | Label = [[Virgin Records|Virgin]] | Last album = ''[[Being Somebody]]''
(2003) | This album = '''''X'''''
(2005) | Next album = | Misc = {{Singles | Name = X | Type = studio | Single 1 = [[Song 4 Lovers]] | Single 1 date = 26 September 2005 | Single 2 = [[A Night to Remember (Shalamar song)|A Night To Remember / Everybody Dance]] | Single 2 date = 16 November 2005 | Single 3 = [[X (song)|X]] | Single 3 date = 19 June 2006 }} |}} '''''X''''' is the third and final studio album released by British pop group [[Liberty X]]. The album was released on 10 October 2005, and was re-issued on 19 June 2006. The album featured the singles "Song 4 Lovers", the double A-side "A Night To Remember" / "Everybody Dance" and "X". The album was the least successful of their three studio albums, only peaking at #27 on the [[UK Albums Chart]] and selling less than 50,000 copies. The album featured a selection of remixes of the group's previous singles. The Australian version of the album was packaged with a bonus DVD containing several of the group's music videos from throughout their career, however, omits the tracks "It's OK" and "Everybody Dance" for contractual reasons. ==Track listing== # "X" (Douglas, Lundon, Young, Taylor, Simm) # "It's OK" (Delgado, Byker, Lundon) # "Song 4 Lovers" (Full Length Version) (Featuring [[Rev Run]]) (Lundon, Rev Run) # "Then There Was You" (Mahoney, Lundon, Simm, Taylor, Young) # "Shotgun" (Secon, Lundon, Young, Taylor, Simm) # "Yo DJ" (Mahoney, Lundon, Simm, Taylor) # "In My Bed" (Secon, Young, Taylor, Simm) # "Dirty Cash" (Martin, Lundon) # "Move Ya Body" (Mahoney, Lundon, Simm, Taylor, Young) # "Divine Intervention" (Harwood, Lundon) # "Being Nobody" ('X' Mix) (Oakey, Marsh, Ware, Wolinski) # "Got To Have Your Love" ('X' Mix) (Wilson, Khaleel, Rodriguez) # "Holding On For You" ('X' Mix) (Prime, Simm, Lundon, Taylor, Young, Laws, Hurrell) # "Just A Little" ('X' Mix) (Escoffery, Hammond Hagan) ; 'Xtra' New Issue Trackshttp://eil.com/shop/moreinfo.asp?catalogid=343750 : 11. "A Night To Remember" (Beard, Meyers, Sylvers) : 12. "Everybody Dance" (Lundon, Young, Simm, Taylor) ; Australian Bonus DVDhttp://eil.com/shop/moreinfo.asp?catalogid=354694 # "A Night To Remember" # "Song 4 Lovers" # "Being Nobody" # "Got To Have Your Love" # "Holding On For You" # "Just A Little" ==References== {{reflist}} {{Liberty X}} {{DEFAULTSORT:X (Liberty X Album)}} [[Category:Liberty X albums]] [[Category:2005 albums]] [[Category:2006 albums]] [[Category:Virgin Records albums]] [[it:X (album Liberty X)]]
